title: Head of FP&A

pay_input_ranges.title: Salary Range
pay_input_ranges.blurb: The US base salary range for this full-time position is the salary range below + bonus + equity + benefits. Wing’s salary ranges are determined by role, level, and location. Your recruiter can share more about the specific salary range for your location during the hiring process.

content:
About Wing: 
Wing offers drone delivery as a safe, fast, and sustainable solution for last mile logistics. Consumer appetites for on-demand services are increasing, but current delivery methods are inefficient, costly, and contribute to road accidents and air pollution. Wing’s fleet of autonomous delivery drones can transport small packages directly from businesses to homes on-demand, in minutes. We design, build, and operate our aircraft, and offer drone delivery services on three continents. Our technology is designed to be easy to integrate into existing delivery and logistics networks, offering a scalable drone delivery solution for a broad range of businesses. Wing is a part of Google's parent company, Alphabet, and our mission is to create the preferred means of delivery for the planet. To do this, we must build a workforce that's representative of the global communities that we serve. If you're ready to do the greatest work of your life, come join us.About the Role: 
We are looking for a Head of FP&A based in Palo Alto, CA to lead a team of analysts to manage Wing’s resource allocation, short and long term financial projections, business analysis and required return on investment. You will play a strategic role in Wing, interfacing with cross functional leads, Wing leadership as well as Alphabet Finance leadership. You’re a good fit for this position if you can work well cross functionally to solve messy, complex problems and can provide top tier business analysis grounded in data.
What You’ll Do:

Manage, coach and develop a small, centralized team of finance analysts for success 
Develop a strong perspective on what world-class FP&A should look like at Wing, and manage a roadmap to execute on your vision
Manage all aspects of budgeting and forecasting for Wing, including creating annual plan and updating financial projections monthly
Approve all spend and contracts for Wing; determine and hold teams accountable to spend thresholds to ensure efficient allocation of resources across the team
Establish success metrics and milestones for partnerships/deals; determine appropriate capital allocation and budgeting
Build and maintain 5-yr plan, including leading plan alignment meetings with Corp Dev, M&A Finance, Alphabet leadership, and the Wing board
Regularly update Wing leadership on the state of Wing’s business, including key operational and technical metrics
Own all executive-level Wing financial reporting
Review, analysis, and reporting of all corporate cost centers 

What You’ll Need: 

Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience
12+ years of relevant experience in finance, management consulting, corporate strategy or similar environment, including FP&A and project management experience.
Experience working with analytical, quantitative, and relational database platforms

Bonus: 

Superior business partnering skills incl. the ability to build senior level relationships, trust and get things done across functional boundaries; ability to be a trusted translator between product & finance leadership
Distinctive problem solving and analytical skills, combined with impeccable business judgment and ability to communicate with highly technical management team
Financial modeling skills; understanding trends, developing insights, turning them into strategies with high impact
Exemplary oral and written communication skills with a demonstrated track record of effectively partnering with technical, business, and operations colleagues.
Organized, strategically focused, detail oriented, self-starter
Proven financial planning, systems, budgeting and forecasting experience
Knowledge of operational planning/finance systems including SQL, SAP, PIVT, and SIMBA
The US base salary range for this full-time position is the salary range below + bonus + equity + benefits. Wing’s salary ranges are determined by role, level, and location. Your recruiter can share more about the specific salary range for your location during the hiring process.Salary Range$200,000—$280,000 USD
